ta_LK{
    Version{"2.1.27.40"}
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                "HH:mm:ss zzzz",
                "HH:mm:ss z",
                "HH:mm:ss",
                "HH:mm",
                "EEEE, d MMMM, y",
                "d MMMM, y",
                "d MMM, y",
                "d/M/yy",
                "{1}, {0}",
                "{1} ’அன்று’ {0}",
                "{1} ’அன்று’ {0}",
                "{1}, {0}",
                "{1}, {0}",
            }
        }
    }
}
